title: Is AHS A Product of Bobby Reichter? AHS Theory Video
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: It would be very interesting if Bobby Richter is the storyteller of all the seasons. If you think about it, 1984 had a lot of elements from previous seasons, a haunted location, serial killers, occult practices, etc
Queen your theories are so original and creative yet they make so much sense, amazing job

I like some parts of this theory, like we know that Twisty was made into a comic but I think it would make more sense of some seasons were the real world whereas others are a story. Like we know that season 6 is very much based in reality, and seasons 3/8/1 are all linked but season 4 could easily be a series of comics and season 9 could be a novel written by Bobby or even by Brooke or Donna
what an amazing theory mary, i love how your mind works, thats what keeps me coming back to youre channel for more.
Another cool theory video! Loved this one, Mary, it’s fantastic.
